name: Montgom
bio: Montgom moved into management after following the well know addage 'Those who can't play, manage' in early Febuary. A natural, born leader Although yet to fruit some results, the board has full confidence Montgomery's managership. Viva le Montgom

name: George
bio: George's playing career has sadly had to come to an end with his recent injury. He will be a valuable addition to the management staff bringing the tactical awareness.

name: Will F
bio: Will F brings the 'zest' to Infidels F.C. management team
